Looking for a feature-packed and efficient media player to manage, organize, and play different types of video content? Enter VidHub! As the newest and most popular media player, VidHub serves up more than just the ability to play all types of video formats. With extensive media library management and network sharing functionalities, VidHub promises stable and speedy video playback for an exceptional user experience. Some of the key features that VidHub offers include: - Support iOS, Mac, Apple TV platform, data synchronization through iCloud - Support for a comprehensive range of video formats, including .mkvã€.aviã€.mp4ã€.movã€.rmvbã€.wmv, and more - High-quality video playback for HD, 4K, HDR, and various other resolutions - The ability to enable and disable subtitles, with support for embedded and external subtitle formats such as SRT, SSA, and SUB - Network sharing capabilities, with support for SMB/CIFS, WebDav, and other protocols, as well as access to cloud-based video files from Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, and Baidu Netdisk, Aliyun disk, 139 drive, 115 netdisk, enabling easy access to video files on remote servers and cloud storage services. - Support downloading and deleting cloud files - Support renaming cloud files, support add character, replace character, regular expression renaming method. - Support direct-link to Emby, Jellyfin, Plex media server. - Built-in media library management tools, with an intuitive interface for displaying videos and customizable sorting options by type, date, rating, and more. All in all, VidHub offers a fully-featured and outstanding media player experience, delivering the smoothest and highest-quality viewing experience for all types of video content, with all the customizations and features one could desire. Note: The metadata and artwork are sourced from TMDB, a movie and TV show database that is maintained by the community. Traverse the dungeon in this awesome action roguelite bullet hell inspired by The Binding Of Isaac and Tiny Rogues, where every choice could make or break your run. Stack over 100 different items and create powerful synergies to become truly overpowered with over 10 unique characters! BALANCE RISK & REWARD Balance risk and reward as your make your choices! Push your luck to grow your build, but don't overestimate your abilities, or your run could end on the spot. Navigate the dungeon wisely and reap the rewards to optimize your build to crush the dungeon with 10+ unique characters!â€‹ BECOME OVERPOWERED Over a hundred unique items can be mixed and matched to create a devastating build, laying waste to every enemy in sight! Be careful not to hurt yourself with an item that doesn't fit, and experiment with synergies to become an overpowered behemoth!â€‹ FIND SECRETS Uncover the secrets of the dungeon on your quest to slay the Villian to unlock hidden paths, uncover new items, and grow your band of adventurers! And for those who crave a challenge, the greatest rewards are locked behind the greatest trials! PLAY WITH FRIENDS Play solo or with others in local co-op, with up to 4 people! entry.title: Sismo: Vibration Meter & Alert
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼šHK$Â 18.00 â†’ å…è²» [å…è²» ~ HK$Â 18.00]ï¼‰

å…¨éƒ¨ä»·æ ¼ä¿¡æ¯

ä»·æ ¼ï¼šå…è²»

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

Sismo vibration meter is analyzes the data from the iPhone or iPad accelerometer and builds a vibration spectrum. This allows users to see if an earthquake is happening in their area. Measure all vibrations and earthquakes ! How it works Seismometers are devices used to measure earthquakes. They are also known as seismographs or body tremors. Seismometers are used in seismology to measure the strength and direction of earthquakes. Sismo uses the iPhone or iPad's accelerometer to detect vibrations in the ground. These vibrations are then analyzed to create a vibration spectrum. This spectrum is then compared to known earthquake waveforms. The Sismo iPhone App is the perfect tool for anyone interested in seismology or earthquakes. Sismo is analyzes the data from the iPhone or iPad accelerometer and builds a vibration spectrum. This allows users to see if an sismic activity is happening in their area. Check the vibrations with your phone! Sismo is a seismometer that measures the vibration of the Earth. It is used to study earthquakes and tsunamis.One of the most important tools for seismologists is the seismometer, which is used to measure the vibration of the earth caused by earthquakes. The seismometer can also be used to measure the body tremor of people suffering from Parkinson's disease. Measure vibrations with iPad or iPhone. Always see these vibes with great viewing options. Customize the application with your own colors with 4 views. Special Views ; â— OSCILLOSCOPE The oscilloscope view is arranged for a full hollywood effect and is enjoyable to watch on your iPad or iPhone at your desk. â— METRONOME Metronome view detects harsh vibrations and has a plain appearance. â— GEYSER Geyser view also includes an alarm function and will easily show you the smallest movements like a geyser. You can set the threshold of vibrations listening and the threshold at which the Alarm will sound. â— WAVE The wave appearance can be set as a straight wave or a moving wave, allowing you to measure with high precision. Many views give you the chance to make a full screen. This allows you to focus on data only. You can also use it as a hollywood effect. People around you will be amazed when they see the cinematic view on your device. In addition, you can customize the entire appearance through the settings tab, if you are using your device with a stand, you can easily control the tilt of your stand with the bubble level function, which you can access under the settings tab and you can make accurate measurements with a perfectly flat floor.

entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼šHK$Â 88.00 â†’ HK$Â 58.00 [HK$Â 22.00 ~ HK$Â 88.00]ï¼‰

App å…§è³¼è²·é …ç›®

  • Orbit Packï¼šHK$Â 38.00

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

Have you ever struggled to find confidence on stage or inspiration in the studio? AeroPads cues immersive pads and soundscapes that inspire and equip you to perform and write your best. ENHANCE YOUR SOUND. ENGAGE YOUR AUDIENCE. Every musician has experienced an empty mix or an awkward transition. When using AeroPads, you instantly add more dimension and character to your sound. With a more immersive mix and the ability to perform smooth and seamless transitions, you will feel more confident while your audience will be more engaged. FOR EVERY MUSICIAN. Pads and soundscapes are a versatile accompaniment to nearly any style of music. Whether you are a soloist or full band, AeroPads will take your sound to the next level. Rock bands, worship teams, wedding singers, producers, songwriters, and instrumentalists are just a few of the many types of musicians that have loved using AeroPads. DESIGNED FOR THE STAGE. INSPIRED BY SPACE. AeroPads features creative and immersive soundscapes paired with a beautiful and intuitive interface, all inspired by the pinnacle of exploration and inspiration: outer space. CREATIVITY THAT SPARKS CREATIVITY. AeroPads aren't your typical pads. Most pads out there are really boring or insanely obnoxious. However, AeroPads features thoughtfully crafted soundscapes that are meticulously fine-tuned with the perfect amount of harmonic and textural movement. Simply put, AeroPads won't step on the toes of your arrangement or get on the nerves of your sound guy (like most other pads out there). Highlighted Features: - A beautiful space-inspired interface with a simple and intuitive design. - Live View: Every key and three of your favorite patches are instantly accessible (best suited for experimentation, free-flowing sets, and songwriting). - Setlist View: Plan and build a detailed setlist (best suited for structured sets and seamless transitions). - The iconic Atmosphere Soundpack which includes five unique patches named after and inspired by the layers of Earth's atmosphere. - Three patches can be added to Live View to be made instantly accessible, so there's no need to dig through menus to just to change a patch when performing live. - Additional patches and Soundpacks available for purchase. - Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral. - Concert pitch adjustment. How to Use: 01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement. 02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes. 03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration. Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.

entry.title: LMP - Music Hub
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼šHK$Â 22.00 â†’ HK$Â 8.00 [HK$Â 8.00 ~ HK$Â 22.00]ï¼‰

å…¨éƒ¨ä»·æ ¼ä¿¡æ¯

ä»·æ ¼ï¼šHK$Â 8.00

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

Play local music or stream from a file/media server with LMP. Apple TV version included, with support for Emby, Navidrome, Plex, and Jellyfin. â–£ Import via iTunes or folder and play local tracks LMP was designed from scratch with offline music in mind. You can store music on your device in two forms: iTunes music or audio file. The first would require syncing with iTunes on Windows or Finder on Mac. To import as audio files, simply transfer them to the LMP Music folder on your device via any means. If you choose the latter, you will be able to enjoy additional features, such as editing of metadata via the LMP browser assistant. â–£ Connect to a cloud server and stream music from the server If you have insufficient storage on your device, you can also store your tracks on a server and stream from the server. File servers using SMB and WebDAV are supported. However, we recommend hosting a media server instead, via Plex, Emby, Navidrome or Subsonic due to faster import speeds. All tracks come together seamlessly, no matter how they are imported, providing a unified experience. You can enable the option in the settings to hide repeated tracks across servers. â–£ Manage playlists with ease LMP has its own playlist system that allows you to not only add tracks from all sources, but also artists. All tracks belonging to the artist would automatically be added to the playlist everytime you open the app or rescan, even newly added ones. With flexible artist splitting, you will be able to ensure that tracks get allocated to the right artist. When the AI playlist is enabled, LMP will also be able to generate a playlist for you based on your listening preferences. Usage data is only recorded if this feature is enabled, and all data recorded for this is stored locally, so you do not have to worry about data privacy. â–£ Supports CarPlay & Siri With support for CarPlay, you can start playing a playlist or control what's playing from your car's CarPlay console. Alternatively, you can also tell Siri to start playing a track or all tracks belonging to a particular artist, or use it to control the playback state of the current track. â–£ Support LRC lyrics LMP supports both embedded lyrics and .lrc files. Use the LRC or Enhanced LRC format, and the app will be able to autoscroll lyrics as the music plays. If you do not have time to add your own lyrics, you can specify the lyrics API to use, and the app will attempt to fetch lyrics of any track that is playing. â–£ Browser Assistant Manage local files on the app using the LMP browser assistant, which you can open on your computer's browser. Import new files or move/delete existing files using the Folders tool, edit music metadata using the Metadata tool or even manage your playlists using the playlists tool.
